trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> object in the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor de componente para o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> object in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control at design time, under the control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> classe fornece uma interface do usuário para edição de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> elementos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> objeto associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controle em tempo de design, sob o controle do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> objeto.

trans-unit.source: There is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: Há um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> associados a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> object is used to apply styles to static submenu items that depend on their level (nesting depth) in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> objeto é usado para aplicar estilos a itens de submenu estático que dependem de seu nível (profundidade de aninhamento) na estrutura do menu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> is invoked, for example, by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelSubMenuStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> é invocado, por exemplo, selecionando o botão de reticências (**... **) no **LevelSubMenuStyles** linha o **propriedades** grade do visual designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false` to indicate that only one object can be selected at a time in the editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> método sempre retorna `false` para indicar que apenas um objeto pode ser selecionado por vez no editor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> method creates a new form to display and edit the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> método cria um novo formulário para exibir e editar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> method creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> método cria uma nova instância do tipo de item de coleção especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A> method returns an array of types that the editor can create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A> método retorna uma matriz de tipos que o editor pode criar.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> and <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> (the collection editor base class) classes with a property in a custom control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class, that gets and sets a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> atributo para associar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> e <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> classes (coleção editor classe base) com uma propriedade em um controle personalizado, derivado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> classe, que obtém e define um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the collection to edit.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> da coleção a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> class when you select, for example, the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelSubMenuStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer when designing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control or a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> classe quando você selecionar, por exemplo, no botão de reticências (**... **) no **LevelSubMenuStyles** linha o **propriedades** grade do visual designer durante a criação de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controle ou um controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether multiple <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> elements can be selected in the editor at one time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se vários elementos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" /> podem ser selecionados no editor de uma só vez.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false`; thus, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> método sempre retorna `false`; assim, apenas um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objeto pode ser selecionado por vez no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new form to display and edit the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova forma para exibir e editar a coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm" /> to use as the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm" /> a ser usado como o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> base method to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> form, and then formats a caption for the form.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> base do método para criar a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> de formulário e, em seguida, formata uma legenda para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the item to create.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do item a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do tipo de item da coleção especificado.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified type, which should be <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do tipo especificado, que deve ser <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> method is used to create new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> método é usado para criar novos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> calls the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method to access the activation methods for late-bound support.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> chama o <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> método para acessar os métodos de ativação para suporte de associação tardia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data types that this collection editor can create.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os tipos de dados que este editor de coleção pode criar.

trans-unit.source: A type array of the data types the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor" /> can create.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipos dos tipos de dados que o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor" /> pode criar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> object can create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> type objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> pode criar objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objetos de tipo.
